original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices up 4.5-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices gained 4.5 percent from a week ago at an auction on June 01, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts increased to 72,846.66 from 69,699.63 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority.
The highest price was 76,100 rupees for 1,000 nuts slightly up from the previous week’s 75,200 rupees, while the lowest was 67,000 up from 66,500 rupees.
The auction offered 850,576 coconuts and 718,923 nuts were sold. (Colombo/June 07/2023)
